resources.string: Wrx can be modded for offroading just like a jeep.
WRX The Subaru with a Turbo.
Buying a WRX read this first.

The WRX needs the timing belt changed every 100k miles. The engines over time leak a little oil check your oil with every gas fill. Make sure you have the coolant where is should be. Some stock engines have known to have head gasket issues if you let it over heat. Drive careful but have fun.
